alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 8:29PM CDT until March 26 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Little Osage River near Horton affecting Vernon County. Marmaton River near Nevada affecting Vernon County. For the Little Osage River Basin...including Horton...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Marmaton River Basin...including Nevada...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Osage River near Horton. * WHEN...Until early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 41.0 feet, minor flooding affects low lying areas near the gage site and farmland along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 43.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 43.3 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 41.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. Thursday evening at 830 PM CDT.
